mapper.select: SELECT BGNO, BGNAME, BGUSED, BGREPLY, BGREADONLY, BGNOTICE FROM TBL_BOARDGROUP WHERE BGDELETEFLAG='N' AND BGNO=#{bgno} AND BGUSED='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN TBL_BOARDGROUP TBG ON TBG.BGNO=TB.BGNO LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TB.USERNO=CU.USERNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD(BGNO, BRDNO, BRDTITLE, USERNO, BRDMEMO, BRDNOTICE, BRDDATE, BRDDELETEFLAG, LASTDATE, LASTUSERNO, ETC1, ETC2, ETC3, ETC4, ETC5) VALUES (#{bgno}, BRDNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{brdtitle}, #{userno}, #{brdmemo}, #{brdnotice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, 'N', SYSDATE, #{userno}, #{etc1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etc2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etc3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etc4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etc5, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT BGNO , BRDNO , BRDTITLE , USERNM AS BRDWRITER , BRDMEMO , BRDNOTICE , BRDLIKE , TO_CHAR(BRDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BRDDATE , TB.USERNO , TB.ETC1 , TB.ETC2 , TB.ETC3 , TB.ETC4 , TB.ETC5 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREAD WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) BRDHIT , (SELECT 1 FROM TBL_BOARDLIKE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND USERNO=#{field2}) BRDLIKECHK FROM TBL_BOARD TB LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TB.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{field1}
SELECT BRDNO FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO=#{brdno} AND USERNO=#{userno}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO TBL_BOARDREAD USING DUAL ON (BRDNO = #{field1} AND USERNO = #{field2}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET READDATE=SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (BRDNO, USERNO, READDATE) VALUES (#{field1}, #{field2}, SYSDATE)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARDLIKE(BLNO, BRDNO, USERNO, BLDATE) VALUES (BLNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{field1}, #{field2}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT FILENO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} ORDER BY FILENO DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARDFILE (FILENO, BRDNO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE) VALUES (FILENO_SEQ.NEXTVAL,
#{parentPK},
BRDNO_SEQ.CURRVAL,
#{filename}, #{realname}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, RENO, USERNM REWRITER, REDELETEFLAG, REMEMO, TO_CHAR(REDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') REDATE , REPARENT, REDEPTH, REORDER, TBR.USERNO, CU.PHOTO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TBR.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE BRDNO=#{brdno} AND REDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY REORDER

SELECT BRDNO, RENO, USERNM REWRITER, REDELETEFLAG, REMEMO, TO_CHAR(REDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') REDATE , REPARENT, REDEPTH, REORDER, TBR.USERNO, CU.PHOTO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_USER CU ON TBR.USERNO=CU.USERNO WHERE REDELETEFLAG='N' AND RENO=#{reno}
SELECT BRDNO, REDEPTH+1 REDEPTH , NVL((SELECT MAX(REORDER) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE REPARENT=TB.RENO), TB.REORDER) REORDER FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TB WHERE RENO=#{reparent}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE REPARENT=#{reparent} AND RENO!=#{reparent} AND REDELETEFLAG='N'
SELECT RENO FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE REDELETEFLAG='N' AND RENO=#{reno} AND USERNO=#{userno}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR1 SET TBR1.REORDER = TBR1.REORDER - 1 WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 0 FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR2 WHERE TBR2.RENO = #{reno} AND TBR2.BRDNO=TBR1.BRDNO AND TBR1.REORDER > TBR2.REORDER AND TBR1.REDELETEFLAG='N' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TB.BRDNO) AS RNUM, BGNO, BRDNO, CU.USERNM, TB.USERNO, BRDTITLE, BRDMEMO , TO_CHAR(BRDDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BRDDATE, TO_CHAR(BRDDATE,'HH24:MI:SS') BRDTIME FROM TBL_BOARD TB INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON CU.USERNO=TB.USERNO WHERE TB.BRDDELETEFLAG='N' AND BRDNO > #{brdno} ) WHERE RNUM <= 20

SELECT BRDNO, RENO, USERNM, TBR.USERNO, REMEMO, REDATE FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY TBR INNER JOIN COM_USER CU ON CU.USERNO=TBR.USERNO AND RENO > #{field2} AND BRDNO <= #{field1} WHERE REDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY RENO
SELECT BRDNO parentPK, FILENO, FILENAME, REALNAME, FILESIZE FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE FILENO > #{field2} AND BRDNO <= #{field1} ORDER BY FILENO
